iti23:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti23:2.1: “This one thing, mendicants, when developed and cultivated, secures benefits for both
iti23:2.2: the present life and lives to come.
iti23:2.5: This is the one thing that, when developed and cultivated, secures benefits for both
iti23:2.6: the present life and lives to come.”
iti23:2.7: That is what the Buddha said.
iti23:4.3: A wise one, comprehending the meaning,
iti23:5.1: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
